00023 cMainWindow::cMainWindow()
00024 {
00025     // specified for QSettings to work properly
00026     QCoreApplication::setOrganizationName("FIT");
00027     QCoreApplication::setOrganizationDomain("fit.vutbr.com");
00028     QCoreApplication::setApplicationName("Wormhole X-treme");
00029     settings = new QSettings();
00030     readSettings();
00031 
00032     glWidget_format = new QGLFormat();
00033     glWidget = NULL;
00034 
00035     dialog_settings = new cDSettings(this);
00036     dialog_settings->setWindowTitle(tr("cDSettings"));
00037 
00038     this->setWindowTitle(tr("Wormhole X-treme"));
00039 
00040     stateCWidget = this->windowState();
00041     sizeCWidget = this->size();
00042     posCWidget = this->pos();
00043 
00044     createActions();
00045     createMenus();
00046     createToolBars();
00047     createStatusBar();
00048 
00049     widget_progressBar = new QWidget;
00050     progressbar_glWidget = new QProgressBar;
00051     label_progressbar = new QLabel;
00052     vboxlayout_glWidget = new QVBoxLayout;
00053     label_progressbar->setText(QString("Loading..."));
00054     label_progressbar->setAlignment(Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignBottom);
00055     vboxlayout_glWidget->addStretch();
00056     vboxlayout_glWidget->addWidget(label_progressbar);
00057     vboxlayout_glWidget->addWidget(progressbar_glWidget);
00058     vboxlayout_glWidget->addStretch();
00059     progressbar_glWidget->setValue(0);
00060     widget_progressBar->setLayout(vboxlayout_glWidget);
00061     setCentralWidget(widget_progressBar);
00062 
00063     createNonGLWidgetConnections(); // except connections to glWidgets
00064 
00065     QTimer::singleShot(100, this, SLOT(reCreateGLWidget()));
00066 //    //reCreateGLWidget();
00067 }

00079 cMainWindow::~cMainWindow()
00080 {
00081     writeSettings();
00082 
00083     delete glWidget_format;
00084     delete dialog_settings;
00085     delete glWidget;

00098 void cMainWindow::createActions()
00099 {
00100     resetAction = new QAction(QIcon("./images/reset.png"), tr("&Reset"), this);
00101     resetAction->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+R"));
00102     resetAction->setStatusTip(tr("Reset game"));
00103 
00104     playPauseAction = new QAction(QIcon("./images/play.png"),
00105                                   tr("&Play"), this);
00106     playPauseAction->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+P"));
00107     playPauseAction->setStatusTip(tr("Play game / Pause game"));
00108 
00109     fullscreenAction = new QAction(QIcon("./images/window_fullscreen.png"),
00110                                    tr("&Fullscreen"), this);
00111     fullscreenAction->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+F"));
00112     fullscreenAction->setStatusTip(tr("Toggle fullscreen"));
00113 
00114     settingsAction = new QAction(QIcon("./images/settings.png"),
00115                                  tr("&Settings"), this);
00116     settingsAction->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+S"));
00117     settingsAction->setStatusTip(tr("Launch settings dialog"));
00118 
00119     aboutAction = new QAction(tr("&About"), this);
00120     aboutAction->setStatusTip(tr("Show the application's About box"));
00121 
00122     aboutQtAction = new QAction(tr("About &Qt"), this);
00123     aboutQtAction->setStatusTip(tr("Show the Qt library's About box"));
00124 
00125     aboutOpenGLAction = new QAction(tr("About Open&GL"), this);
00126     aboutOpenGLAction->setStatusTip(tr("Show info about OpenGL."));
00127 
00128     helpAction = new QAction(QIcon("./images/help.png"), tr("&Help"), this);
00129     helpAction->setStatusTip(tr("Show the help box"));
00130 
00131     exitAction = new QAction(QIcon("./images/exit.png"), tr("E&xit"), this);
00132     exitAction->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+Q"));
00133     exitAction->setStatusTip(tr("Exit the application"));
00134 
00135 }

00144 void cMainWindow::createMenus()
00145 {
00146     gameMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Game"));
00147     gameMenu->addAction(playPauseAction);
00148     gameMenu->addAction(resetAction);
00149     gameMenu->addSeparator();
00150     gameMenu->addAction(exitAction);
00151 
00152     settingsMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Settings"));
00153     settingsMenu->addAction(fullscreenAction);
00154     settingsMenu->addAction(settingsAction);
00155 
00156     menuBar()->addSeparator();
00157 
00158     helpMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Help"));
00159     helpMenu->addAction(aboutAction);
00160     helpMenu->addAction(aboutQtAction);
00161     helpMenu->addAction(aboutOpenGLAction);
00162     helpMenu->addAction(helpAction);
00163 }

00172 void cMainWindow::createToolBars()
00173 {
00174     circleSectorsSlider = createCircleSectorsSlider();
00175     circleSectorsSlider->setToolTip(tr("Wormhole circle sectors"));
00176     circleSectorsSlider->setStatusTip(tr("Wormhole circle sectors"));
00177     //circleSectorsSlider->setTracking(false);
00178 
00179     whSectorsSlider = createWhSectorsSlider();
00180     whSectorsSlider->setToolTip(tr("Wormhole sectors"));
00181     whSectorsSlider->setStatusTip(tr("Wormhole sectors"));
00182     //whSectorsSlider->setTracking(false);
00183 
00184     polygonModeComboBox = new QComboBox;
00185     polygonModeComboBox->setToolTip(tr("Polygon mode"));
00186     polygonModeComboBox->addItem("GL_FILL");
00187     polygonModeComboBox->addItem("GL_LINE");
00188     polygonModeComboBox->addItem("GL_POINT");
00189 
00190     QGroupBox *groupBox = new QGroupBox(tr("Wormhole"));
00191     QVBoxLayout *vbox = new QVBoxLayout;
00192     vbox->addWidget(whSectorsSlider);
00193     vbox->addWidget(circleSectorsSlider);
00194     groupBox->setMaximumWidth(100);
00195     groupBox->setLayout(vbox);
00196 
00197     wormholeToolBar = addToolBar(tr("Wormhole"));
00198     addToolBar(Qt::RightToolBarArea, wormholeToolBar);
00199     wormholeToolBar->addWidget(groupBox);
00200     wormholeToolBar->addWidget(polygonModeComboBox);
00201     //addToolBar ( Qt::ToolBarArea area, QToolBar * toolbar )
00202 
00203     gameToolBar = addToolBar(tr("Game"));
00204     addToolBar(Qt::TopToolBarArea, gameToolBar);
00205     gameToolBar->addAction(resetAction);
00206     gameToolBar->addAction(playPauseAction);
00207     gameToolBar->addSeparator();
00208     gameToolBar->addAction(fullscreenAction);
00209     gameToolBar->addAction(settingsAction);
00210     gameToolBar->addSeparator();
00211     gameToolBar->addAction(helpAction);
00212 }

00222 void cMainWindow::createStatusBar()
00223 {
00224     statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Ready"));
00225     label_bestscore = new QLabel(QString("Best score: ") +
00226                                  QString().number(settings_bestscore, 10) +
00227                                  QString(" "));
00228     statusBar()->addPermanentWidget(label_bestscore);

00242 void cMainWindow::writeSettings()
00243 {
00244     settings->beginGroup("MainWindow");
00245         settings->setValue("size", size());
00246         settings->setValue("pos", pos());
00247     settings->endGroup();
00248 
00249     settings->beginGroup("GLWidget");
00250         settings->setValue("recreateGL", settings_recreateGL);
00251         settings->setValue("antialiasing", settings_antialiasing);
00252         settings->setValue("multisampling", settings_multisampling);
00253         settings->setValue("bestscore", settings_bestscore);
00254     settings->endGroup();
00255 
00256     settings->beginGroup("Difficulty");
00257         settings->setValue("navigation",  settings_navigation);
00258         settings->setValue("difficulty",  settings_difficulty);
00259     settings->endGroup();
00260 
00261     settings->beginGroup("SpaceShip");
00262         settings->setValue("object",  settings_object);
00263     settings->endGroup();
00264 
00265     settings->beginGroup("Wormhole");
00266         settings->setValue("polygons",  settings_polygons);
00267     settings->endGroup();
00268 
00269 //    settings->beginGroup("ToolBar");
00270 //        settings->setValue("polygonMode",  settings_polygonMode);
00271 //    settings->endGroup();
00272 }

00285 void cMainWindow::readSettings()
00286 {
00287     settings->beginGroup("MainWindow");
00288         resize(settings->value("size", QSize(500, 400)).toSize());
00289         move(settings->value("pos", QPoint(100, 100)).toPoint());
00290     settings->endGroup();
00291 
00292     settings->beginGroup("GLWidget");
00293         settings_recreateGL = settings->value("recreateGL", false).toBool();
00294         settings_antialiasing = settings->value("antialiasing", 0).toInt();
00295         settings_multisampling = settings->value("multisampling", 0).toInt();
00296         settings_bestscore = settings->value("bestscore", 0).toInt();
00297     settings->endGroup();
00298 
00299     settings->beginGroup("Difficulty");
00300         settings_navigation = settings->value("navigation", true).toBool();
00301         settings_difficulty = settings->value("difficulty", QString("Easy")).toString();
00302     settings->endGroup();
00303 
00304     settings->beginGroup("SpaceShip");
00305         settings_object = settings->value("object", QString("small_ship.obj")).toString();
00306     settings->endGroup();
00307 
00308     settings->beginGroup("Wormhole");
00309         // 0 - triangles, 1 - quads
00310         settings_polygons = settings->value("polygons", 0).toInt();
00311     settings->endGroup();
00312 
00313 //    settings->beginGroup("ToolBar");
00314 //        settings_polygonMode = settings->value("plygonMode", 0).toInt();
00315 //    settings->endGroup();
00316 }

00323 QSlider *cMainWindow::createWhSectorsSlider()
00324 {
00325     QSlider *slider = new QSlider(Qt::Horizontal);
00326     slider->setRange(100, 400);
00327     slider->setSingleStep(1);
00328     slider->setPageStep(10);
00329     slider->setTickInterval(30);
00330     slider->setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksRight);
00331     slider->setValue(200);
00332     return slider;
00333 }

00340 QSlider *cMainWindow::createCircleSectorsSlider()
00341 {
00342     QSlider *slider = new QSlider(Qt::Horizontal);
00343     slider->setRange(20, 70);
00344     slider->setSingleStep(1);
00345     slider->setPageStep(5);
00346     slider->setTickInterval(5);
00347     slider->setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksRight);
00348     slider->setValue(25);
00349     return slider;
00350 }

00363 void cMainWindow::reCreateGLWidget()
00364 {
00365     // Try to enable MultiSampling 2x 4x 8x?
00366     if(this->settings_multisampling != 0 && glWidget_format->doubleBuffer())
00367     {
00368         // Try to enable DoubleBuffering
00369         glWidget_format->setSampleBuffers(true);
00370         glWidget_format->setDoubleBuffer(true);
00371         glWidget_format->setSamples(this->settings_multisampling * 2);
00372     } else
00373     {
00374         // Try to enable DoubleBuffering
00375         glWidget_format->setDoubleBuffer(true);
00376         glWidget_format->setSampleBuffers(false);
00377     }
00378 
00379     if(glWidget != NULL)
00380     {
00381         glWidget->close();
00382         delete glWidget;
00383 
00384         widget_progressBar = new QWidget;
00385         progressbar_glWidget = new QProgressBar;
00386         label_progressbar = new QLabel;
00387         vboxlayout_glWidget = new QVBoxLayout;
00388         label_progressbar->setText(QString("Loading..."));
00389         label_progressbar->setAlignment(Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignBottom);
00390         vboxlayout_glWidget->addStretch();
00391         vboxlayout_glWidget->addWidget(label_progressbar);
00392         vboxlayout_glWidget->addWidget(progressbar_glWidget);
00393         vboxlayout_glWidget->addStretch();
00394         progressbar_glWidget->setValue(0);
00395         widget_progressBar->setLayout(vboxlayout_glWidget);
00396         setCentralWidget(widget_progressBar);
00397 
00398         qApp->processEvents();
00399     }
00400 
00401     this->setDisabled(true);
00402     glWidget = new cGLWidget(*glWidget_format, this);
00403     this->setDisabled(false);
00404 
00405     label_progressbar->close();
00406     delete label_progressbar;
00407     progressbar_glWidget->close();
00408     delete progressbar_glWidget;
00409     delete vboxlayout_glWidget;
00410     delete widget_progressBar;
00411 
00412     createGLWidgetConnections();
00413     setCentralWidget(glWidget);
00414 
00415     glWidget->setFocus();
00416 
00417     // if not double buffer then no sample buffer
00418     if(glWidget_format->sampleBuffers() && !glWidget_format->doubleBuffer())
00419         reCreateGLWidget();
00420 }
00421 
00428 void cMainWindow::createGLWidgetConnections()
00429 {
00430     connect(circleSectorsSlider, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),\
00431             glWidget, SLOT(setCircleSectors(int)));
00432     connect(whSectorsSlider, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),\
00433             glWidget, SLOT(setWhSectors(int)));
00434     connect(polygonModeComboBox, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(const QString &)),\
00435             glWidget, SLOT(setPolygonMode(QString)));
00436 
00437     connect(resetAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), glWidget, SLOT(reset()));
00438     connect(playPauseAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), glWidget, SLOT(playPause()));
00439     
00440     connect(fullscreenAction, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00441             glWidget, SLOT(toggleFullScreen()));
00442 }
00443 
00450 void cMainWindow::createNonGLWidgetConnections()
00451 {
00452     connect(settingsAction, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00453             this, SLOT(execSettingsDialog()));
00454     connect(aboutAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(about()));
00455     connect(aboutQtAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), qApp, SLOT(aboutQt()));
00456     connect(aboutOpenGLAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(aboutOpenGL()));
00457     connect(helpAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(help()));
00458     connect(exitAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(close()));
00459 }
00460 
00469 void cMainWindow::execSettingsDialog()
00470 {
00471     if(!glWidget->bPause)
00472         glWidget->playPause();
00473 
00474     if(glWidget->bFullScreen)
00475         glWidget->toggleFullScreen();
00476 
00477     dialog_settings->setSettingsDialog();
00478     dialog_settings->exec();
00479 
00480     QTimer::singleShot(10, glWidget, SLOT(recreateWormhole()));
00481 
00482     if(this->settings_recreateGL == true)
00483     {
00484         QTimer::singleShot(100, this, SLOT(reCreateGLWidget()));
00485     }
00486 }

00495 void cMainWindow::about()
00496 {
00497     QMessageBox::about(this, tr("Wormhole X-treme About"),
00498              tr("<b>Wormhole X-treme</b><br>"
00499                 "is an OpenGL game developed under Qt<br>"
00500                 "(cross-platform application and UI framework).<br><br>"
00501                 "Application version: <b>1.0</b><br><br>"
00502                 "Author: David Smejkal<br>"
00503                 "Brno University of Technology,<br>"
00504                 "<b>F</b>aculty of <b>I</b>nformation <b>T</b>echnology"));
00505 
00506 }

00517 void cMainWindow::aboutOpenGL()
00518 {
00519     QString str = "<b>OpenGL supported Versions:</b><br>";
00520     int OGLVersion = glWidget_format->openGLVersionFlags();
00521     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_Version_None)
00522         str += "None, ";
00523     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_Version_1_1)
00524         str += "1.1, ";
00525     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_Version_1_2)
00526         str += "1.2, ";
00527     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_Version_1_3)
00528         str += "1.3, ";
00529     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_Version_1_4)
00530         str += "1.4, ";
00531     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_Version_1_5)
00532         str += "1.5, ";
00533     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_Version_2_0)
00534         str += "2.0, ";
00535     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_Version_2_1)
00536         str += "2.1, ";
00537     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_ES_CommonLite_Version_1_0)
00538         str += "ES 1.0 CommonLite, ";
00539     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_ES_Common_Version_1_0)
00540         str += "ES 1.0 Common, ";
00541     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_ES_CommonLite_Version_1_1)
00542         str += "ES 1.1 CommonLite, ";
00543     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_ES_Common_Version_1_1)
00544         str += "ES 1.1 Common, ";
00545     if(OGLVersion & QGLFormat::OpenGL_ES_Version_2_0)
00546         str += "ES 2.0, ";
00547     str.chop(2);
00548     str += "<br><br>";
00549 
00550     str += "<b>OpenGL active techniques:</b><br>";
00551 
00552     str += "DoubleBuffering - ";
00553     if(glWidget_format->doubleBuffer()) str += "Yes<br>";
00554     else str += "No<br>";
00555 
00556     str += "AutoBufferSwap - ";
00557     if(glWidget->autoBufferSwap()) str += "Yes<br>";
00558     else str += "No<br>";
00559 
00560     str += "DepthBuffering - ";
00561     if(glWidget_format->depth()) str += "Yes<br>";
00562     else str += "No<br>";
00563 
00564     str += "ColorMode - ";
00565     if(glWidget_format->rgba()) str += "RGBA<br>";
00566     else str += "ColorIndex.<br>";
00567 
00568     str += "AlphaBuffering - ";
00569     if(glWidget_format->alpha()) str += "Yes<br>";
00570     else str += "No<br>";
00571 
00572     str += "AccumulationBuffering - ";
00573     if(glWidget_format->accum()) str += "Yes<br>";
00574     else str += "No<br>";
00575 
00576     str += "StencilBuffering - ";
00577     if(glWidget_format->stencil()) str += "Yes<br>";
00578     else str += "No<br>";
00579 
00580     str += "StereoBuffering - ";
00581     if(glWidget_format-> stereo()) str += "Yes<br>";
00582     else str += "No<br>";
00583 
00584     str += "DirectRendering - ";
00585     if(glWidget_format->directRendering()) str += "Yes<br>";
00586     else str += "No<br>";
00587 
00588     str += "OverlayPlane - ";
00589     if(glWidget_format->hasOverlay()) str += "Yes<br>";
00590     else str += "No<br>";
00591 
00592     str += "MultisampleBuffering - ";
00593     if(glWidget_format->sampleBuffers())
00594         str += QString().number(glWidget_format->samples()) + "x<br>";
00595     else str += "No<br>";
00596 
00597     QMessageBox::about(this, tr("OpenGL Info"), str);
00598 }

00610                        tr("<b>Goal:</b><br>"

00613                           "as long as you can. Stay away from deadly<br>"
00614                           "surface of the wormhole!<br>"
00615                           "<br>"
00616                           "Good luck, Commander...<br>"
00617                           "<br><br>"
00618                           "<b>Controls:</b><br>"
00619                           "<br>"
00620                           "(general bindings)<br>"
00621                           "Q, Esc         - Exit<br>"
00622                           "F, DoubleClick - toggle fullscreen<br>"
00623                           "C              - center camera<br>"
00624                           "R              - reset game<br>"
00625                           "P              - toggle pause<br>"
00626                           "<br>"
00627                           "(paused - free look mode)<br>"
00628                           "UpArrow,    W  - camera forwards<br>"
00629                           "DownArrow,  A  - camera backwards<br>"
00630                           "LeftArrow,  S  - camera strafe-left<br>"
00631                           "RightArrow, D  - camera strafe-right<br>"
00632                           "Scroll         - camera forwards/backwards<br>"
00633                           "LMB, RMB       - look around<br>"
00634                           "MMB            - reset camera position<br>"
00635                           "<br>"
00636                           "(unpaused - game mode)<br>"
00637                           "UpArrow,    W  - spaceship twist down<br>"
00638                           "DownArrow,  A  - spaceship twist up<br>"
00639                           "LeftArrow,  S  - spaceship twist left<br>"
00640                           "RightArrow, D  - spaceship twist right<br>"
00641                           "Space          - turbo<br>"
00642                           "LMB            - rotate camera around object<br>"
00643                           "MMB            - center camera<br>"
00644                           "Scroll         - zoom<br>"
00645                           ));
00646 
00647 }

00655 void cMainWindow::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent * event)
00656 {
00657     if(!(this->windowState() & 7)) // not (minimized or maximized or fullscreen)
00658     {
00659         sizeCWidget = event->size();
00660     }
00661 }
00662 
00669 void cMainWindow::moveEvent(QMoveEvent * event)
00670 {
00671     if(!(this->windowState() & 7)) // not (minimized or maximized or fullscreen)
00672     {
00673         posCWidget = event->pos();
00674     }
00675 }
